channel.title: I get an error i cant fix
channel.description:
client.java:12463: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms ^ 1 error
i get that error when i compile i tryed to add auto save but it dident work when i delete the line
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
i get 10 errors if i move it up i get 2 if i move it down i get 384
anyone know how i can fix this?

item.title: I get an error i cant fix
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

now i get

client.java:12464: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean process() throws NullPointerException { // is being calle d regularily every 500ms ^ 1 error [br][size=1]Posted at: September 08, 2006, 09:55:21 PM[/size][hr]hello anyone care? or do i need to remake my entire server?

Read full topic
item.source: I get an error i cant fix

item.title: I get an error i cant fix
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

try changing this:

[CODE]}
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(10);

		if(chance == 3) {
			playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff);
			sendMessage("You drain the enemies health!");
			stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
		}[/CODE]

To:

         }

[CODE] public boolean process() throws NullPointerException { // is being called regularily every 500ms
if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(5);

if(chance == 3) {
playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff / 2);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemies health!”);
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}[/CODE]

That should work, it worked for me

Read full topic
